long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the Adhkar Reminder Chrome Extension! This extension helps you integrate remembrances and supplications (Adhkar) into your browsing time.

Let's explore what exactly it is all about:
This extension serves as a companion during your screen time by delivering periodic pop-ups of Adhkar on any tab you're using. Its goal is to help you remember your supplications, whether you're working, browsing social media, or simply watching YouTube videos.

1- Key Features:

• Periodic Reminders: A periodic remembrance Popup that slides in from the upper-right corner of your browser and slides back out after no more than 8 seconds with the possibility to hide it at will, ensuring minimal disruption to your browsing experience.

• Rich Content: Over 75 Adhkar in Arabic script.

• Customization: Toggle the popup display, adjust its frequency, and choose between dark or light themes, all within an intuitive settings panel.

• User-Friendly Interface: Features an intuitive and user-friendly design, making it easy to navigate and understand.


2- Getting Started:

• Installation:
Once installed, you can pin it to the extensions toolbar.

•Configuration:
Access the extension's settings by hovering over the popup to show the settings icon, and personalize reminder frequency and other preferences according to your liking.

• Usage:
After customization, sit back and keep browsing as you would always do, the extension will periodically display popups containing Adhkar on whatever tab you're using.

As simple as that!
